headline: 2 Reasons to Like MRK (and 1 Not So Much)
summary: The past six months haven’t been great for Merck. It just made a new 52-week low of $79.69, and shareholders have lost 26.6% of their capital. This was partly due to its softer quarterly results and might have investors contemplating their next move.

headline: Shareholders that lost money on Merck & Co., Inc.(MRK) should contact The Gross Law Firm about pending Class Action - MRK
